tagline.en: Build a grounded Mass-adoption EOS Economy
tagline.cn: 打造落地且大规模应用的EOS区块经济体

introduce.en:
*Sheleaders is a non-profit decentralized autonomous community initiated by women founders, investors and scholars who keep exploring and driving innovation. 

*Sheleaders is community-owned blockchain developer, incubator, investor and block producer of credible blockchain ecosytems.

*Sheleaders welcomes everyone including male to be one of its co-owners and co-builders. 


*Part of our initiators: 

Musika, founder of SheLeaders, serial entrepreneur, former senior managing member of Qihu 360.
Jessie, founder of JM Capital & Chief Editor of 8btc.
Dan Li, COO of Mixin & Co-founder of Big.one.
Lory LUO, IGF China.
Hua Zhang, Investor of Lbank.info & founder of DAEX.
Stacey LI, Co-founder of ZKChain News.
May LU, UN Development Programme.
Cytheria Fan, CEO of JuSpace.

We help 700 million Chinese women understand EOS !
We work for a grounded Mass-adoption EOS Economy !
introduce.cn:
*Sheleaders是由持续探索和驱动创新的女性创始人、投资人和学者共同发起的非盈利性去中心化自治社区。

*Sheleaders由社区成员共同拥有，是值得信任的区块链生态的区块链开发者、孵化者、投资者和区块生产者。

*Sheleaders欢迎包括男性在内的任何人加入并成为社区的共同拥有者和共同建设者。


*我们部分女性共同发起人包括：

Musika, SheLeaders创始人，连续创业者，奇虎360前高管
小萌，JM资本创始人，巴比特总编
薄荷，Mixin COO & big.one联合创始人
Lory, IGF中国
张华，Lbank.info投资人 & DAEX创始人
May LU, 联合国开发计划署
范李悦，聚币集团副总裁 & 聚空间CEO。
